thread.title: Cloudy weekend ahead for UAE with light rains
thread.title_full: Cloudy weekend ahead for UAE with light rains

title: Cloudy weekend ahead for UAE with light rains

organizations.name: national centre of meteorology and seismology

text: Cloudy weekend ahead for UAE with light rains Web Team Filed on February 24, 2017 | Last updated on February 24, 2017 at 08.28 am Share Vote The weather might get humid during the day. The day in UAE is set to be partly cloudy with slight chances of rain over coastal, islands and northern areas. According to the latest update by National Centre of Meteorology and Seismology (NCMS), relative humidity will increase during the night and early morning over few areas. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 24, 2017 Overcast skies will prevail across UAE tomorrow as well with chances of light rains. The sea will be moderate to rough in Arabian Gulf and moderate in Oman Sea.
